content: **the handwritten cowl is a beautifully textured design that you ll love wearing ** **free version can be found on my **blog** 1 ** **size ** one size adult **skill level ** easy **yarn **#5 bulky weight 2 skeins 218 yards luxe bulky 100% baby alpaca in color handwritten by threadhead knits co or suitable substitute weight #4 or #5 just check gauge **hook size ** us size j/10 6 0mm - adjust hook size if needed to meet gauge **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet *this pattern has been tested to ensure accuracy * copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //simplyhookedbyjanet com/handwritten-cowl-crochet-pattern/
